title: 55.7km of Hell: Rating the Bone-Rattling Cobblestones at Paris-Roubaix
content:
Both races see more pavé and the legendary Trouée d'Arenberg, Mons-en-Pévèle, and Carrefour de l'Arbre are back as the most feared and challenging five-star sectors.

Read the full article at 55.7km of Hell: Rating the Bone-Rattling Cobblestones at Paris-Roubaix on Velo.
author: ahood
